title: Putty panels lose focus on touchpad scroll
author: randman1
body_snippet: I have found some strange behavior with panel focus in version 1.76.8.17254. Scrolling up or down using the laptop's touchpad in any panel containing a Putty session will cause focus to be lost to the main window. Scrolling works as long as my finger remains on the touchpad but as soon as I lift my finger off of the touchpad, the Putty session will no longer accept any additional input from the keyboard or mouse until the Putty session window is clicked again. comments.snippet: I also see this same behavior in 1.74.6023.15358 on the same laptop. Both are the portable versions.
